alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:59PM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers, locally heavy at times, slowly tapering off overnight. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with 10 to 12 inches above 8000 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Buffalo Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Buffalo Pass 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
